This film is a charming and witty exploration of the lives of two iconic filmmakers, Alfred Hitchcock and François Truffaut, as they meet to discuss their craft. With a talented cast, including Will Smith and Eva Mendes, this movie is a delightful and engaging watch.

I think I can help you out!

Considering your interest in war movies and the director Rand Ravich, I highly recommend "Zero Dark Thirty" (2012). This intense and gripping film takes you on a thrilling ride as it recounts the decade-long hunt for Osama bin Laden after 9/11. With an all-star cast, including Jessica Chastain and Mark Duplass, this movie is sure to keep you on the edge of your seat!

If you're looking for something a bit more classic and romantic, I think "A Farewell to Arms" (1929) would be a great choice. This timeless tale of love and sacrifice during World War 1 stars Henry Fonda and Helen Hayes, and is a beautiful adaptation of Ernest Hemingway's novel.

Let me know if you have any questions or if you'd like more recommendations!

The film features a talented cast, including James Franco and Philip Winchester, and is sure to captivate you!
